# se-container



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | Type                               | Default      |
| ---------- | ---------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------- | ------------ |
| `mode`     | `mode`     | Defines the inner apparance of a container. `widget` Add a small spacing all around the container so all widgets are spaced with the same distance. `full` Default. Take the full space of the container. `centered` center the container so the content does no exceed a max width.                                                     | `"centered" \| "full" \| "widget"` | `'full'`     |
| `position` | `position` | In specific case, it can be necessary to define the container with an absolute position (inside an angular router-container ). Most of the time, the default position will work perfectly with flex box. `relative` Default. Perfect to use with flex content. `absolute` Help in specific cases. Make sure you know that you are doing. | `"absolute" \| "relative"`         | `'relative'` |
